competitive_edges.title: Our Competitive Edges

description: T2 Soft is an IT outsourcing company specializing in software development and maintenance services for global clients. With experienced Korean IT professionals leading the projects and a dynamic team of skilled Vietnamese developers, we deliver high-quality, customized solutions quickly and reliably. At T2 Soft, we are committed to being your trusted development partner, supporting your digital transformation and sustainable business growth every step of the way.
description_mobile: T2 Soft is an IT outsourcing company specializing in software development and maintenance services for global clients.

focus_industries.description: T2 Soft leverages extensive project experience and technical expertise across various industries to deliver customized IT solutions. We work hand-in-hand with our clients to maximize business value, driving both efficiency and innovation.

why_vietnam.title: Why Vietnam?
why_vietnam.description: Vietnam provides an ideal outsourcing environment for global companies, offering skilled IT talent, competitive costs, fast technology adoption, and reliable development services.

process.title: Our Working Process
process.description: T2Soft delivers fast and efficient IT services through a standardized and professional process, precisely tailored to meet each client's needs

client_request.title: Client Request
client_request.description: We gather the client's project goals and define the initial direction

requirement_analysis.title: Requirement Analysis
requirement_analysis.description: We analyze the client's requirements in detail to determine development feasibility and scope
details: Identify core features and detailed requirements
Review technical feasibility and potential risks
Anticipate potential issues and define response strategies

proposal.title: Proposal
proposal.description: Based on the analysis, we provide an optimized development proposal
details: Define development scope and phased approach
Prepare cost estimates and manpower plan
Deliver and explain the proposal to the client

client_approval.title: Client Approval
client_approval.description: We finalize the proposal by incorporating the client's review and feedback

contract_sign_off.title: Contract Signing
contract_sign_off.description: A formal contract is signed based on the agreed terms and conditions
details: Specify cost, schedule, and project scope
Assign project manager and key contacts
Complete and archive the signed agreement

project_kick_off.title: Project Kick-off
project_kick_off.description: After signing, the project officially begins with a dedicated development team
details: Share and initiate initial project schedule

contact_cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Ideas?
contact_cta.description: Let's discuss how T2 Soft can help you achieve your technology goals. Our team is ready to bring your vision to life.

unique_value.title: We make sure to provide best services
unique_value.description: What sets us apart from other technology providers and makes us your ideal partner.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: Our rigorous quality control processes ensure that every line of code meets the highest standards. We implement comprehensive testing methodologies including unit testing, integration testing, and automated QA processes to deliver robust, bug-free solutions.

technical.title: Technical Expertise
technical.description: Our team comprises specialists across various technologies and domains. From cloud architecture to AI implementation, mobile development to enterprise solutions, we bring deep technical knowledge and practical experience to every project.

cultural.title: Cultural Alignment
cultural.description: We bridge Eastern dedication with Western business practices. Our team understands global business cultures while bringing Vietnamese values of diligence, precision, and commitment to excellence, creating a harmonious working relationship with clients worldwide.

scalable.title: Scalable Solutions
scalable.description: We design with growth in mind. Our architecture and development approaches prioritize scalability, allowing your solutions to grow seamlessly with your business. From startups to enterprises, we build technology that adapts to your evolving needs.

services.question: What programming services do you offer?
services.answer: We provide end-to-end software development services including web and mobile app development, backend systems, API integrations, and maintenance support.

technologies.question: Which technologies do you specialize in?
technologies.answer: Our team specializes in a wide range of technologies including JavaScript (React, Node.js), Python, Java, PHP, .NET, and cloud platforms like AWS and Azure.

quality.question: How do you ensure code quality?
quality.answer: We follow best practices such as code reviews, unit testing, continuous integration, and use of version control to maintain high code quality.

communication.question: Can I communicate directly with the developers?
communication.answer: Yes, we provide direct communication channels with our developers via tools like Slack, Zoom, or email to ensure smooth collaboration.

pricing.question: What is your pricing model?
pricing.answer: We offer flexible pricing models including hourly rates, dedicated team setups, and fixed-price contracts depending on your project needs.

about.title: About Us
about.title_sub: With a global perspective and deep local insights, We bridges cultures and technologies to deliver real business value.
about.content: T2 Soft is an IT outsourcing and systems integration company providing software development, maintenance, and IT consulting services for global clients. Led by experienced Korean IT professionals and supported by a dynamic team of skilled Vietnamese developers, we combine technical expertise, cultural understanding, and cost-efficiency to deliver real business value. We specialize in developing smart, scalable, and reliable solutions tailored to our clients' needs — from enterprise systems to AI-powered applications and custom software. At T2 Soft, we grow together with our clients — through innovation, transparency, and a shared vision for sustainable success.

banner.desc: 지금까지의 오피스를 잊게 만드는, 새로운 일상이 시작됩니다. 업무 공간의 효율성과 조직 문화를 동시에 혁신하는 첫걸음을 지금 시작해보세요.

1.title: 공간과 시간을 더 똑똑하게
1.desc: 업무 환경을 스마트하게 개선하여 비용 절감 및 업무 몰입도 향상시킵니다.

2.title: 일하고 싶은 문화, 그 시작
2.desc: 유연한 근무 환경으로 조직 문화 개선과 직원 만족도 향상을 동시에 실현합니다.

3.title: 데이터 기반, 전략적 의사결정
3.desc: 실시간 공간 활용 및 업무 데이터를 분석하여 정확한 의사결정을 지원합니다.

officeIntro.title: 지루한 출근은 이제 그만!
officeIntro.desc: 스마트 오피스 솔루션은 출근부터 퇴근까지의 모든 순간을 더 편리하고 유연하게 만들어줍니다. 업무 효율은 물론, 조직 문화와 직원 만족도까지 함께 향상시키는 새로운 근무 환경으로, 일의 방식과 사무 공간에 대한 인식을 변화시켜 나갑니다.

1.title: 유연 근무제 예약방식 지원
1.desc: 종일 좌석 예약, 선택 시간 예약, 기간별 좌석 예약 등 회사 문화와 정책에 맞게 운영이 가능합니다.

2.title: 좌석 위치 직관적인 확인 가능
2.desc: 직관적인 도면 통해 좌석 위치를 확인하고 예약자 및 팀원 현황까지 한눈에 파악할 수 있습니다.

3.title: 클릭 한번으로 입/퇴실 관리
3.desc: 간편한 클릭 한 번으로 출입 기록부터 근태 관리까지 스마트하게 해결할 가능합니다.

2.title:
공간을 효율적으로
관리할 수 있는 회의실 예약시스템

1.title: 주기 회의 반복 예약 가능
1.desc: 일/주/월/년 주기로 설정할 수 있는 회의실 반복 예약 기능을 지원합니다.

2.title: 회의실 위치와 상태 확인 가능
2.desc: 실시간으로 회의실의 위치와 사용 가능 여부를 확인할 수 있어, 더 빠르고 효율적인 회의실 예약이 가능합니다.

3.title: 외부 참석자 관리도 편하게
3.desc: 임직원 아닌 외부 참석자 정보까지 손쉽게 등록 및 관리할 수 있어, 회의 준비와 출입 관리가 한층 더 효율적입니다.

4.title: 현장 예약까지 쉽고 빠르게
4.desc: 회의실에 설치된 월패드를 통해 별도의 장비나 앱 없이도 현장에서 바로 회의실 예약이 가능합니다.

1.title: 다수의 방문자를 일괄로 방문 예약
1.desc: 신청자 정보 / 방문지 정보 / 신청서 작성을 단계적 구조로 입력하여 쉽게 다수의 방문 예약을 일괄로 처리할 수 있습니다.

2.title: 방문자 다수 일괄 등록으로 번거로움 해소
2.desc: QR코드 출입 인증 연계로 출입기록을 관리합니다.

4.title:
언제 어디서나 언택트로
주문 가능한 사내 카폐식당

1.title: 언택트 주문 시스템
1.desc: 복잡한 줄서기는 이제 그만! 모바일로 간편하게 주문하고, 바로 픽업 가능합니다.

2.title: 식사 선물하기 기능
2.desc: 감사의 마음을 따뜻한 한 끼로! 동료에게 식사를 선물하며 조직 문화를 더 가깝게 만들 수 있습니다.

3.title: 실시간 메뉴 확인
3.desc: 오늘 점심 뭐 먹지? 매일 바뀌는 메뉴를 앱에서 한눈에 확인할 수 있습니다.

4.title: 주문 내역 확인
4.desc: 내가 언제 무엇을 주문했는지, 손쉽게 확인하고 재주문도 간편하게!
